title: Identifying What Each Term Represents
text: $$x$$ represents the number of months that have passed, and P(x) represents the number of koi in the pond at $$x$$ months.

title: How to Find the Initial Population of Koi
text: The initial population of koi is P(x) when $$x=0$$.
speech: The initial population of koi is P(x) when  x is equal to 0, .
